div.p:
Curia Balliuorum de Abirdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem decimoseptimo
die mensis Decembris Anno Domini et cetera quingentesimo nono

The said day it was statut and ordanit be the Prouost bailyeis ande
Counsaile that the sacristar sal nocht oppin nane Erd in thar paris' kirk
to mak gravis nor laris without licence of the masteris of the kirk werk
And gif he or his substitut' oppinnis the erd but licence as said is the said
sacristar sal pay xxtj s' for euiry graive that he oppinnis And euiry on' fre
man or woman that lyis in the said kirk sal pay xxtj s' for thar laire
Alsua the personis of the auld' blud of the towne that happinnis to ly in the
said kirk salbe considerit be the quantite of thar gudis and extentit be the
prouost and masteris of the kirk werk for the tyme for thar laris And the sacristar
sale clois' ale gravis and cleng and dicht ale stanis and filtht that happinnis
tocum furtht of the said gravis within aucht dais eftir the erd be oppinnit

The said day it was statut and ordanit be the prouost bailyeis and Counsaile
for the gud of the kirk werk that ale tennentis of the wattir of Done avand'
malis to the said werk sal pay thar malis to the mastiris of werk betuix
this and youle evin nixt hereftir And quhat persone or personis that failyeis in
pament of the said malys sal pay ane barell of salmond' for fourty
tua schillingis to the said mastiris of werk at midsomire nixt hereftir or
within xv dais thareftir

The said day for the vphalding of divin seruice to the honour of god
and haly kirk et cetera The prouost bailyeis and Counsaile grantit and'
Consentit to pay to ser thomas bynne four pundis aving of termes bigan
to him And has assignit to him xl s' yerlie to be ressauit of the malis
of thar vuire mylne tharof xxtj s' at Witsonday and xxtj s' at mertimes
And' assignit to ser Wilyeame Wricht chaplane xl s' yerlie to be
ressauit of the malis of the said myle at the said termes of Wit
sonday and mertymes for his gud and continuale seruice to be maid in the
said kirk and grant to pay him xl s' for his fee of the yer bigan
Item thai ordane thar denys of gild' to prouid' ane gowne price
xiiij to Willy brovne Item a govne to Johnne buchane a govne xiiij
s' Item to thome' forbes ane govne price xiiij s' Item to gilbert bynne
a govnne price xiiij s' And tua markis to Johnne goldsmyth for thar
gud and continuale seruice to be maid' in singing in the said kirk
at ale houris tymes and placis according tharto

head.add: Craik disposicioun' of the quarter clerkschip of the castelgat

div.p:
The said day the prouest bailyeis and Counsaile Riplie auisit deliuerit
gef and assignit to Robert craik sangstar the quarter clerkschip of
the castelgat vacand' be dimissioun' of ser Walter strathachin with
all commoditeis and proffittis pertening or may pertene tharto Induring'
thar will for his gud and continuale seruice to be done in singing'
at ale matutinis mess' ewynsaung' and completoriis at ale tymes et
placis within the said kirk

The said day the prouost bailyeis and Counsaile grantit to ser
Wilyeame coupar thar familiar chaplane the nixt ressonable' seruice or
chaplanry that happinnis to waik being at thar dispoiscioun' conuenient
for his sustentacioun' for his gud and continuale seruice done and
fortobe done within thar said kirk he leving his office of sacristan
schip or clerkschip at the disposicioun' of the townne' quhilk he
ples'

The said day Richerd hendirsoun' litstar tuk to preiwe one friday that
nixt cummys that he had pait the maile of the hous quhilk he inhabit
at the terme of Witsonday bigane quhilk was the said Witsonday termes
maile of Witsonday quhilk hous' pertenis to Duncan Wandy in heritag'

The said' day Normand' leslie officiar' producit certane famous' personis
quhilk suorne the gret aithe deponit that thai was present quhene he
presentit vij elnez' and demy of blak clatht and thre elnez' of grene clath
four' mercate dais in the common mercat of Abirdene takin and resauit fra
Richerde litster in the gallougat to be demandit as law wile for xxix
s' aving to Androw litster and dalie perofferit the said' clatht to sele
to thame that wald' gif mast for it And' becaus' he coud' fand'
nay man to by the said' clath Jonhne frostar and glas' talyouris be thar
aithis prisit the eln' of the said' blak clath to xl d' and the eln' of grene
to thre Schillingis

head.add: the gudis of airschip resauit pertening to Robert raburne

div.p:
The saide day Anny buchane the Relict of Williame Riburne deliuerit
thir gudis eftir writin of airschip to Jonhne raburne tutour of law to
Robert raburne sone and ayr tile vmquhile William raburne burges
of the said' burghe seyne considerit and prisit be thir personis Williame portar
Jonhne portar Ramsay Williame murray and patry arthour' in the first
ane rosset govne price tuentj s' j par schetis j couering j cod' price tene
s' Ane ald' doublat and j par of hous' gevin to goddis folkis j pot and
j pane price tene s' / j chargeour' j dublar j dische j quart and j poynt
weing' xvj li' of peutour price of the li' viij d' j covntour xxtj s'
j Spit and tangis and ane evilcruk and j lavnterin price v s' j gridile v s'
ane chandlar' price xxviij d' j cheir' xij d'

div.head: Hed court
div.p:
Curia Capitalis Balliuorum de abirdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem Septimo
die mensis Januarij Anno Domini millesimo quingentesimo Nono Quo die Sectis
vocatis et Curia affirmata absentes patent et cetera

Eodem die accedens ad barram Religiosus vir frater Johannes Arnot minister domus
sancte trinitatis dictj burgj et protestatus fuit in forma Juris pro vno annuo redditu
quinque solidorum sibi et dicto loco annuatim debito de quadam terra vasta Jacobi pyot pertinenciis
Jacente in vico viridi ex australi parte eiusdem inter terram alexandri gothra ex orientali
ex vna et terram quondam Johannis Torre leitht ex occidentali partibus ab altera
et communionem viam regiam versus boream Ad quam terram accedens nichil reperit distringibile
preter terram et lapides quos balliuis in Sacculo presentauit in curia tanquam secundo
die huius processus Testibus Dauid straloche alexandro blinsele et Andrea nachrj
sergeando

Eodem die accedens ad barram discretus vir magister alexander Bisset capellanus
perpetuus altaris sancti Sanguinis infra ecclesiam parrochialem beati nicholaij de
Abirdene situati et protestabatur in forma Juris pro vno annuo redditu quatuor
solidorum monete scocie sibi et dicto altari annuatim a longo tempore debito non
soluto de quadam terra vasta quondam thome glenmalwyne Jacente in vico futy
inter terram thome lamynton' ex boreali et terram altaris sancti leonardj ex australi et
le lynkis versus oriens et maris fluxum versus occidens Ad quam terram accedens nichil
reperit distringibile preter terram et lapides quos balliuis in sacculo presentauit'
in Curia tanquam secundo die huius processus Testibus alexandro blinsele Dauid
straloche et Andrea nachtj sergeando et cetera

head.add: processus collectoris capellanorum de Abirdene de terra dominj thome hervy

div.p:
Eodem die accedens ad barram discretus vir dominus Johannes Waus collector capellanorum
de abirdene et protestatus fuit in forma Juris pro vno annuo redditu vigitnj solidorum
monete scocie dictus capellanis annuatim debito de quadam terra vasta quondam dominj
thome hervy Jacente infra dictum burgum in vico viridj apud locum sancte trinitatis eiusdem
ex boreali parte vicj eiusdem inter terram Johannis malisone ex orientali et communiones vias
regiss versus austrum et occidens et venellam communionem qua Itur ad capellam sancte trinitatis
versus boream Ad quam terram accedens nichil reperit distringibile preter terram et lapides quos
balliuis in sacculo presentauit in curia tanquam primo die huius processus Testibus Dauid
straloche alexandro blinsele et Andreas nachtj sergeando Tanquam primo die huius processus

Eodem die accedens ad barram religiosus vir frater Johannes Arnot minister domus
sancte trinitatis eiusdem burgi et protestabatur in forma Juris pro vno annuo redditu
quatuor solidorum monete scocie sibi et dicto loco annuatim debito de quadam terra
vasta quondam dominj thome hervy Jacente in vico viri dicti burgj apud dictum
locum sancte trinitatis inter terram Johannis malisone ex orientali et communiones vias
regias versus austrum et occidens et venellam ad capellam beate Katherine
virginis versus boream ascendens Ad quam terram accedens nichil reperit distringibile
pro dicto annuo redditu preter terram et lapides quos balliuis in Curia
presentauit in sacculo tanquam primo die huius processus Testibus vt supra

head.add: processus capellanorum de Abirdene de terra thome og'

div.p:
Eodem die accessit ad barram discretus vir dominus Johannes Waus collector
capellanorum ecclesie beati nicholaij dicti burgj et protestabatur in forma Juris
vt moris est pro vno annuo redditu sex solidorum et octo denariorum vsualis monete
scocie dictis capellanis annuatim debito et non soluto de quadam terra vasta
quondam thome og pertinenciis Jacente infra dictum burgum in vico castrj extra portam
borealem eiusdem inter terram Johannis Wilyoungsoun' ex occidentali ex vna et communiones
vias regias versus oriens austrum et boream Ad quam terram Idem dominus
Johannes accedens nichil reperit distringibile preter terram et lapides quos ballivis
in sacculo presentauit in curia tanquam primo die huius processus Testibus Alexandro
Nory Dauid Waus et Andrea nachtj sergeando

head.add: processus capellanorum de abirdene de terra Elizibeth Dakyr

div.p:
Eodem die accedens ad barram discretus vir dominus Johannes Waus collector ac
procurator capellanorum collegij ecclesie sanctj nicholaij dicti burgj et protestatus fuit
in forma Juris pro vno annuo redditu decim solidorum monete scocie annuatim leuandum
et percipiendum de quadam terra vasta quondam philippi Dumbrek et Dakir
sponse sue pertinenciis Jacente in vico inferiori dicti burgj ex australi parte eiusdem
inter terram Johannis malisone ex occidentali ex vna et terram Andree
meldrum ex orientali partibus ab altera communionem viam regiam versus boream
et terram quondam patricij stiklar versus austrum Ad quam terram accedens
nichil reperit distringibile pro dicto annuo redditu preter terrram et lapides quos
balliuis in sacculo presentauit in Curia tanquam primo die huius processus Testibus
Dauid straloche alexandro blinsele alexandro nory Dauid Waus et Andrea nachtj
sergeando

Eodem die accessit ad barram honestus vir Duncanus craik burgensis dicti
burgj et protestabatur in forma Juris pro vno annuo redditu sex solidorum
vsualis monete scocie sibi annuatim debito de quadam terra vasta quondam
Willelmi froster in futy bet' Inter terram thome bryane ex boreali ex vna
et communionem venellam siue viam regiam qua Itur ab ecclesia sancti clementis versus austrum
et le lynkis versus oriens et maris fluxum versus occidens Ad quam terram accedens
nichil reperit distringibile pro dicto annuo redditu preter terram et lapides quos
balliuis in sacculo presentauit in curia tanquam primo die huius processus Testibus
Dauid straloche alexandro blinsele et Andrea nachtj sergeando

The said day Comperit ser Johnne chamer perpetuale chaplane of
sanct saluatoris alter situat' within the paris' kirk of the said burgh' in tyme
of processing of ane land' liand' in futy pertening tile vmquhile thomas
glenmelvin betuix the land' of thomas lamynton' one the northt the
land' of one the southt part be master Alexander'
bisset chaplane perpetuale of the haly blud alter within the said kirk
Protestit solempnitlie that quaht process' the said master Alexander had
led' or ledis in tyme tocum vppoun' the said land suld' turne him
nor the annuell that he has of the samyn to na preiudice

The said day the court wardit schew for law and it was gevin for dome
be the moutht of Wilyeame fynne dempstar that Wilyeam stile merchand had
sufficiently preuit be certan famous personis that alexander gourlay was dettour to him
for viij s' for half ane boll of quheit quhilkis he come souerte to him for Johnne
Tharfor the bailyeis chargit the officiaris to lay wand' on' the said
alexander and charg him to pay the said viij s' or he Remuf out of the tolbutht to the
said Wilyeam' or ellis find' him sufficient' souerte for pament of the samyn'

The said day the bailyeis chargit Johnne Crag to pay to Johnne' Arthoure the
money contenit in Johnne growell franchemannis obligacioun' within terme
of law quhilk the said Johnne crag tuk him to preif pay within aucht
hi hereftir

The said day the bailyeis assignit friday that nixt cummys to Robert Waus
to bring ane sufficient pouer of Robert pratis ayris or Dauid pratis ayris
that he had to ressaue the annuell of sanct stevinnys land' And failyeing that
he bring nocht the said pouer sufficient to find' caucioun' to ser Androw colisone
chaplane of sanct stevinnis altar that he salbe skathles of all annuellis takin
and to be takin be the said robert one the behalf of the said ayris

The said day the bailyeis assignit friday that next cummys to Robert Waus
to bring his warand' to warand' him anent the hous maile clamyt
on' him be Dauid fynn

The said day the bailyeis assignit this day aucht dais to Wilyeam'
King and patry oudny to bring ane sufficient power of thar wiffis
to follow and persew Johnne moir' for the gudis of airschip clamyt
to pertene to thar said wiffis be the deces' of vmquhile Johnne Knollis
grantsir

The said day Richerd hendirsone litstar failyeit in his preif be
ane lauchfull ward' of the court of the hous maile quhilk he tuk
him to preif pait to Duncan Wandy ffor the quhilkis he was in amerciament
of the court and aucht to pay the said maile to the said Duncan

Curia balliuorum burgi de abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem vndecimo die Januarij
Anno quo Supra

The said' day Johne Colisone bailye Come Souerte be his vphaldin to keipe thomas
straloche and Sandy Donaldsone skathles for the Some of xvij s' aucht be thame
to Robert murray

The said' day Normond' leslie at commavnde of the balyeis chargit Richerde crokskynnar
to remane in the tolbutht quhile he pait to henry bavne sex par' of rasele gluffis
be his avne graunt aving to him

The said' day Jonhne fair' was fundin quyt of charllis stevinsonis seruice and feit seruand'
tile Alexander malisone for this Instant yer

The said day the balyeis assignit this day xv dais to Duncane andirsone tile ansuer
to the borghe fundin one him be thomas lammyntone for the brekin done of his
dikis and ane werkhous'

The said' day the balyeis ordanit Normond' leslie officiar' to Warne the wif of
William lindesay to Comper befor thame on monunday that next Cumis tile ansuer
for tribulance of Robert soutar et cetera

The said' day the balyeis chargit Williame skynner to deliuer to Androw straton the tua
skinnis quhilkis he presentit in Jugement and ale the remanent of the skinnis be his
aitht that he left our the linnyng of the larde of ardendrachtis govne or the sone
gangto of this day

The said' day the borghe' fundin one Richerd' litsar in the gallougate be Androwe
Wricht Cordonare for the wranguis' withhaldin fra him of fiwe eln' and demy eln' of
Clatht quhilkis he deliuerit to him to lyt blak was fundin availe be ane suorne
assis' Alexander gray forspekar for the quhilkis the saide richerd' was in Amerciament of the
Court and awe to deliuer the said clatht to the said' Androw et cetera

The said William' skynnar was conuikit be the said assis' alexander gray forspekar
for tribulance of androw stratoun' and the said androw for tribulance of the said
William for the quhilk Ilkane of tham was in amerciament of the corut and tile amend
as law wil et cetera

Curia balliuorum burgi de abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem xiiijto die Januarij anno
quo supra

The said' day gilbert tulidef Johne buchane alexander Donaldsone Donald' baxtar and Androw
gordone be thar avne toungis graunt was in Amerciament of the courtis for non fulfilling
of the actis maid' Obefor tueching the warne of the officiaris assignit to tham
to wey thar bred' quhene thai ar dravin' or thai be sellit

The said' day It was statut and ordanit be the prouest ballieis and Counsale
that ale the baxtaris of this burghe' sale baik gude and Sufficient bred'
of quhet cleyne weilboutit and bakin the tua penny breid' weing' xxxiiijor
vnce and the penny bred' weand' xvij vncez' And' Ilkan baxtar
to warne his officiar lymmit to him to Cum and wey thar bred' at the dravin'
vndir the pane of ane Amerciament of the court and vthir panys contenit in the
actis maid tharupoun' obefor

The said' day the balyeis assignit this day xv dais to Johne andirsone tile
ansuer to the borghe' fudnin one him be Dauid bannerman that he awche to war
rand' him his hous' quhilk he set him he payand his maile et cetera and wrangis
and he do It nocht et cetera

add.foreign: protestacio Agnetis Scherar' et patricij adamsone

div.p:
The said' day Comperit Anny shcerar' and patry adamsone Offering tham redy
tile vndirly the law in ony thingis that Robert Cordonar in the Cite of abirdene
hed' tile obiek or say to thame sene he was complanteous' one tham and warnit
tharto And' becaus' nay man comperit to Complene one tham nor to persewe tham
thai protestit to be quyt of his challance quhile thai be persevit be newe
presente

The said day all the broustaris of the evin quarter and grene quarter and cruikit
quarter was conuict' be ane suorne assis' patry Reid forspekar for brekin of common
ordinance in selling of aile derrer thane It was set that is to say for viij d' the
galloun' quhair it was statut and ordanit to be sellit for vj d' the galoun'
And for selling of aile for viij d' quhar It was nocht wortht vj d' ffor the
quhilkis ilkan of thame was in tua amercamenis And aucht tile amend as
law will and forber in tyme tocum
Curia balliuorum de abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem xv die mensis Januarij anno quo supra

The saide day Norman leslie William scrimgeor Androw nachtj and Johne Cuk sergeandis was Ilkan of
thame in Amerciament of the court be thar avne toung graunt becaus' thai hed nocht done in the exe
cioun tharof as efferis

The saide day Johne andirsone burges of the saide burghe complenyeit to the prouest and balyeis that
alexander hay hede gretlie and heuelie tribulit him sayand that he tuk and quarter of wole and the
pestlence in It and passit to fiwe or sex hous' of his nychtbouris and specialie to the hous of Wilyeam
andirsone his brothir and distroit him and his barnis throw the saide Infectioun' quhilk the said Johne
denyit referand him to the declaracioun of ane assis of his mastiris and nychtbouris of the toune
lest Suspect best knaving the verite And thareftir the said balyeis accusit the said alexander for tribu
lance of the saide Jonhne quhilk he denyit And in continent batht the said partiis being accusit
for tribulance of vthiris denyit and with bath thar consentis the said actiounis was put to the deter
minacioun' of thir personis eftir writin that is to say Duncan Colisone Androw fif patry chernsid'
alexander malisone Dauid straloche Williame stile master Dauid lousone alexander nory Johne Kintor Duncan
andirsone Symon elloun' Johne murray and Jonhne malisone quhilkis riplie auisit the gret aithe
Suorne the Richtis resonis' allegacionis witnes and preuis of bath the said partiis producit herde seyn' ande
vndirstandin fand and deliuerit be the moutht of the saide Duncan Colisone forspekar of the said assis'
that thai coud nocht acquit the said Alexnader of the tribulance of the said Johne sayand' the said langagis
and wordis for the quhilkis he was in Amerciament of the court and av tile amend' as law wile and
forber' in tym to cum and that was gevin for dome be the moutht of fynne dempstar of the said court
and the said Jonhne quyt of ale tribulance of the said alexander

The said' day ale the broustaris in futy was conuict' be ane Suorne assis' William murray
forspekar for brekand of common ordnance in the selling of aile derrar thane It was
Set for viii d' quhar it was set for vj d' the gallon' and selling of It for viij d' quhar'
It was nocht wortht vj d' the gallon' for the quhilkis Ilkan of thame was in Amerciament
of the Court et cetera

Curia balliuorum burgi de abirdene tenta in pretorio euisdem xviii die Januarij anno
quo Supra

The said' day ale baxtaris of this burghe was conuict' be ane Suorne assis' sere
Jonhne ruthirfurd forspekar becaus' thai wantit bred' of quhet ale at anis
and furnist noch the toune with bred of quhet as efferis
